body: Weird that I can't find these "exclusive" "More Like This" with the Search of name and even tags. Also, somehow I missed this gold of a crossover, 3 most popular Tsundere Loli of the time. Old Iorix model, Shanax and Zero. Imagine them in the same universe while still doing what they were doing in their respective world. / Nice detail there to Zero's "Peach-Blonde" hair and not "deep pink".
